sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SATNA, a British station in Central India, within the state of Rewah, with a station on the East Indian railway, 102 m. S.W. from Allahabad. Pop. (1901) 7471. It is the headquarters of the political agent for Baghelkhand, and an important centre of trade.
